definition: surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
to surpass (old)
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
similar/resembling/to resemble/to be like
surname Xiao/Taiwan pr. [Xiao4]
Zhao Benshan (1958-), universally known PRC TV comedian
Zhao Wei or Vicky Zhao (1976-), Chinese film star
Zhao Yun (-229), general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
Zhao Kuangyin, personal name of founding Song emperor Song Taizu 宋太祖 (927-976)
Zhao, one of the seven states during the Warring States Period of Chinese history (475-220 BC)
Zhao Leji (1957-), member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection
Zhao Shuli (1906-1970), proletarian novelist
Later Zhao of the Sixteen Kingdoms (319-350)
army of Zhao 趙國|赵国 during the Warring States
courtesy name of Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云[Zhao4 Yun2], general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
Zhao County in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei
Former Zhao of the Sixteen Kingdoms (304-329)
Zhao Gao (?-207 BC), one of the most vile, corrupt and powerful eunuchs in Chinese history, responsible for the fall of Qin Dynasty

sentences.english: According to Zhao, life in military campsites is not monotonous.
sentences.chinese: 趙峯表示，軍營生活並不單調。

sentences.english: Zhao Min is a Chinese girl.
sentences.chinese: 趙敏是一箇中國女孩，她今年13歲。

sentences.english: Neal told Tan Ruiling the situation immediately.
sentences.chinese: 趙龍馬上把情況告訴了譚睿玲。

sentences.english: Wu Sun-fu listened attentively, his eyes riveted on Chao Potao's face.
sentences.chinese: 吳蓀甫很注意地聽着，眼光射定了趙伯韜的面孔。

sentences.english: The second emperor committed suicide; Zhao Gao eventually was killed.
sentences.chinese: 秦朝第二個皇帝自盡而死，趙高被殺。

sentences.english: Zhao Zigeng smiled, and did not care to verbal stimuli "."
sentences.chinese: 趙子庚笑笑，毫不在意並以言語刺激宇文。

sentences.english: The Box Hill line, causing trouble for Zhao Yingxiong.
sentences.chinese: 匣子上山一行，爲趙英雄帶來了麻煩。

sentences.english: Zhao Jing Tao, a college student in China, thought of an old saying.
sentences.chinese: 一位中國大學生趙景濤想起了一句古語。

sentences.english: Some officials kept silent because they were afraid of being persecuted by Zhao Gao.
sentences.chinese: 有的大臣害怕遭到趙高的迫害，於是保持沉默。

sentences.english: Doctor zhao old kang to xing full hospital, also let go Li Zhongping followed.
sentences.chinese: 趙醫生安排老康去興滿醫院，還讓黎仲平跟着一起走。

sentences.english: So then the self-proclaimed Fire Song Dynasty, Zhao Germany .
sentences.chinese: 於是趙宋王朝便自命爲火德。

sentences.english: Zhao Junxin learned the craft of embroidering from his grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 趙俊信從奶奶那裏學到了刺繡的手藝。

sentences.english: Australian Liberal Democratic Party's President Huang Zhaoqiang met and praised Zhao for his philanthropic undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲自民黨主席黃肇強都接見並表揚了趙尚陽的善舉。

sentences.english: Zhaolan was married to an actor last month.
sentences.chinese: 上個月趙蘭和一個演員結婚了。

sentences.english: The king of Zhao accpeted the gifts gladly and sent a hundred thousand troops to help Qi.
sentences.chinese: 趙王見了禮物十分高興，派了十萬士兵去援助齊國。

sentences.english: Experience of Zhao shake day arrived the might of landmine, be determined learns to make thunder technology secretly.
sentences.chinese: 趙震天見識到了地雷的威力，決意偷學造雷技術。
